-e ---

𒊑𒀀𒄣 ri-a-qu रिच् ric रिक्त rikta 𐬌𐬭𐬌𐬑𐬙𐬀 irixta ++++
𒊑𒀀𒄣 to be empty ⇔ rekt;) wrecked 𐍅𐍂𐌹𐌺𐌰𐌽 ⇔ *leykʷ- “to leave”

空虚 kōng

shun 𓆄 𓅱 𓃟 | pig | swine 𓆄 𓅱 𓅪 | be empty, be lacking, be devoid (of), be missing (from) |

𓋴 𓈖 𓆑 𓊡 | empty out (contents) |

𓆑 𓎡 𓁸 𓅪 | be empty | vacant <> κενότης kenótēs 𓁸 knot 𓆑 𓎡 𓁸 𓅪 | be empty, be wasted | vacant ≈ vacuité ≈ 𓆄 𓏲 𓏏 𓅪 #šwt𓅪
